date: "11/20/2015"
output: html_document
---

Data was sent to Jamie A. on 11/20/2015 by Cristina Garilao. Three SQL files were sent:

1. `hcaf_ohi.sql` cell specific information
2. `hcaf_species_native_ohi.sql` are all species probabilities per cell
3. `speciesoccursum_ohi.sql` table of all species

***

##Setup

```{r setup}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.path='Figs/', echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE)

source('../../src/R/common.R')
```

```{r SQL}

library(RMySQL)

setwd(dir_neptune_data)

system('mysql -u afflerbach -p -D aquamaps <"git-annex/globalprep/_raw_data/aquamaps/v2015/aquamaps_2015_full_dataset_ohi/hcaf_ohi.sql"')

con <- dbConnect(dbDriver("PostgreSQL"),  host='neptune.nceas.ucsb.edu', dbname='globalprep', user='afflerbach')
